data.name: Rat Royal
data.detailed_description:
They Are Everywhere

Control in one or control a rat trap, compete against other players in teams or solo in different game modes.

The Objective Is :


In Rat Vs Exterminator Mode:
  • As A Rat Steal Valuable Items Lying In the Map
  • As An exterminator Exterminated Rats
In Big Rat Mode:
To be the biggest rat, that is to say to take the most object and fight against the other players so as not to have them stolen.

Multijoueur

Play with your friends, join games created by other players in all available game modes.

All Features:

  • Rats Can Attack
  • Exterminator Can Crush the Rat
  • Exterminator Can Place Traps
  • Exterminator Can Catch Objects
  • Rats Can Grab Objects (only In "big Rat" Mode)
  • A spectator Mode For Players Who Have Lost

data.short_description: Play as a rat and compete or cooperate with other players in different game modes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 32bits
  • Memory: 4gb MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 64bits
  • Memory: 8gb MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
